basics.name: Yiting Zheng
basics.label: PhD Applicant
basics.summary: PhD applicant focusing on dialogue-based learning, computational analysis, and machine learning research. Currently pursuing a Master's degree in Information Technology at Monash University.

work.name: Beijing Corefire Technology Co.
work.summary: Executed full-stack development for multi-platform applications, engineered backend services, and transformed complex business data into interactive visualization dashboards.
highlights: Utilized Java for backend services and Vue3/TypeScript for front-end interfaces
Built RESTful APIs to power data-driven features like merchant revenue analysis
Used Echarts and Antv to support merchant decision-making

education.institution: Nankai University, College of Online Education

projects.name: Exploring Learning Performance through Knowledge and Interaction Analysis in Medical Training Dialogues
projects.summary: Systematic integration and analysis of the dynamic interplay between cognitive processes and socio-emotional dynamics in medical training dialogues, aiming to transform qualitative research insights into quantifiable indicators.

projects.name: Comprehensive Feature Engineering and Predictive Analysis of FLoRA Dialogue Usefulness Scores
projects.summary: Engineered structural and semantic features from dialogue data and developed an XGBoost model that achieved a 20.79% RMSE improvement over baseline.

projects.name: Hospital Discharge Trend Prediction and Resource Optimization
projects.summary: Integrated large-scale heterogeneous data (CMS & CDC) and designed time-series models to predict hospital discharge trends, achieving a MAPE of 0.98%.

projects.name: Residential Market Price Prediction Using K-Nearest Neighbors Regression
projects.summary: Built and tuned a KNN Regression model for property price prediction using advanced feature engineering and rigorous cross-validation.
highlights: Used regular expressions to extract features

projects.name: BirdTag: A Serverless Media Analysis and Management Platform on AWS
projects.summary: Designed and deployed a scalable, serverless cloud application that uses AI for auto-tagging of media files and provides a RESTful API for media management.
